𓀀 man https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Reconstruction:Proto-Indo-European/-mn%CC%A5 ⇔ -μᾰ ma
*-mḗn (< **-mens) (e.g. Ancient Greek ποιμήν (poimḗn, “shepherd”)).
*-mō (< **-mons) (e.g. Latin sermō, Ancient Greek δαίμων (daímōn), Sanskrit अश्मन् (áśman)).

𓐍 𓊪 𓂧 𓅱 𓄹 𓏥 | buttocks | •qphadvr > चूतड़ cūtaṛ कटि kaṭi مَقْعَدَة কটি koti күт küt *köt makat maqʿada

ma acted as a reverse reading direction marker in a world confused by left to right / right to left readings:
𒋢 kuš կաշ kaši cushion reverse ma:
𒋢 mašku[n] 𓄟𓂓𓄛 skin մաշկ mašk مَسْك mask 𐎶𐏁𐎣𐎠 mussuck µ.Sack

ubiquitous noun-prefix and suffix µ ⇔ ma ⇔ mes ⇔ ism
𓂓 Karma काम
makros μεγάλος groß megálos 𒃲 µGAL
mizhelet מִזְחֶלֶת > sledge 𓍃𓅓𓏏𓆱
µHAND > 𓂜 MANU main
µ umukara = 𓐍 (black@Bantu)
Sanskrit संस्कृत sáṃskṛta- sáṃ:sym zusammen kṛta 𓂓 (sic) nominally संस्कृतम्, saṃskṛtam

ⲥⲧⲏⲑⲟⲥ stēthos => ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉⲛϩⲏⲧ mestenhēt (chest, thorax)

noun prefix 'um' : a, an, ein, one

𓅓 gerund prefix: im Tanze = dancing

may-I = Frage partikel 𓅓 «ma?» 吗 ⇔ mama 妈 mā 𓅐 鸟 niǎo, ne? genau? gnost?

𓏪 𓏥 𓏼
-𒀀𒀀𒄑𒍣 •-a-a-iz-zi •mas (noun marker) 𒈨𒌍 MES

ma (being) => mätön -ma-ton dont-be! ≠ment (kärsiä.mätön) un¬gedultig

𓈙 𓈙 𓀁 | mix, mingle with, confuse (message, words) | sys… sym… µsch : mischen

The standard explanation for these ma bound-articles is 'an' '-ing' '-one' '-ness' or 'make'

Some known (and tentative) examples:

τάγμα tag => tagging, rank
στίγμα stick => stigma (Stech-Marke)
σχῆμα schein/schön => appearance
στράτευμα Streit => strategem (army)
στερέωμα stehreo 𓊢 => steadfastness
χρίσμα crys⋍gloss crysma=an anointing / make glossy,shiny,...
πτύσμα spit => spittle
πόμα boire => a drink
ποίημα a thing made
περίσσευμα prassen => √poly: abundence
ὀφείλημα Fehlen => offense, debt
ὁρμά hurry => hurrying
ὄμμα eye ὄ => an eye
νόημα know => noema (mind)
μνῆμα mur? => monument
μίασμα Mist/mies => miasma
μίγμα mix => mixture
λιμά ? => why?
κτίσμα create => creature
κρίμα cry/decree => verdict
κήρυγμα cry@Kur => proclamation
κοιμάο Koie => Koma
κάλυμμα column => veil ?
πάθημα pain => passion
ἱεράτευμα hierat(holy priest) => act of priesthood
θέλημα tell => wish
θαῦμα sight? => marvel
ζημία ζη? => damage (make dzaη…)

As prefix
ματαιολογία talk => mathaiοlοgia (foolish talking)
μαστίζ stick => flog, scourge
μαραίν ruin ῥῆγμα => die/marode √mar!
μωραίν ? => moron
μαμωνᾶς money => Mammon
μαλακία lax => mal(sick)
μακράν grand/currant => makro
μαγεύ manna? => magic
μυελός 肉? => marrow
μεθύσκ toxic => metaxa (make drunk)
μεγαλύν gal<gvr => megalo, magnify
μάχαιρα Schere/sword => Machete √cut
μάκελλον ⋍carne/⋍sell? => market
Μακεδονία getae => Macedonia (ma semitic: Land(of))
μακαρίζ care/glad => blessed
μαθητεύ tutor? => make disciples
